column4: Does anyone know why my inetd.conf file would be empty (as in, 0kb)?
then how would I close unneeded ports? =/
Ubuntu has a policy of 0 open ports by default. If you don't believe the ububuntu devs, install firestarter from apt
yea I installed firestarter, but when i nmap myself im getting open ports... am I missing something here.. =/
